articles.title: Sanjiv Goenka likely to buy Lucknow franchise as BCCI set to introduce two new teams from IPL 2022 - Times Now
articles.description: RPSG Group's Sanjiv Goenka is reportedly interested in buying the Lucknow franchise for the 2022 season of the Indian Premier League (IPL).
articles.content:
